name: Projects
description: Explore a showcase of high-impact work led by Rito, a Strategic Synthesis Specialist, highlighting full-stack brand, product, UX, and engineering execution across industries including fashion, blockchain, and gaming.

item.name: NYT-Featured Fansite for Caroline Vreeland
item.description: End-to-end production of a New York Times recognized fansite, using lean Next.js architecture and CMS-like functionality.

item.name: Wearable Tech Pilot with Celebrity Fashion Designers
item.description: Orchestrated branding, design, and deployment of smart QR dog tags used in a high-fashion tech runway show.

item.name: Call of Duty QA Campaign with Global Coverage
item.description: Transformed QA findings into an infotaining content campaign that led to studio-level fixes and press coverage.

item.name: Strategic Brand Repositioning for William Entriken
item.description: Led personal brand transformation and CMS integration for blockchain pioneer William Entriken.

item.name: ERC Blockchain Standard Co-Authorship
item.description: Co-authored a pivotal Ethereum standard with William Entriken to influence blockchain-wide adoption.
